rows.label: qst202015_msg0001
rows.name: Yes? How can I help you?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh gosh... Well, thank you for coming
all the way here to deliver it.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0011
rows.name:
Wait...this is a golden bracer!
It looks so expensive. I'm not
sure I can accept this...

rows.label: qst202015_msg0012
rows.name: But then again, it is from Daddy...

rows.label: qst202015_msg0004
rows.name: How're he and Musubi doing these days?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0005
rows.name:
Musubi looked after me and my brother
for most of my childhood, you know.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0006
rows.name:
She's very calm and gentle for a Blade.
The kindest one I know.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0008
rows.name: It's a necklace made from Pione Stone.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0009
rows.name:
If you see Musubi, could you please pass
it on to her?

rows.label: qst202015_msg0010
rows.name: Thank you. That's very kind of you.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0101
rows.name: Musubi was like a mother to us.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0102
rows.name:
She's very calm and gentle for a Blade.
The kindest one I know.

rows.label: qst202015_msg0103
rows.name: I'd love to see her again sometime...
